name: [Code Golf] Block Letter Printer
description:
This is the **code golf** version of [this kata](https://www.codewars.com/kata/6375587af84854823ccd0e90/) -- it's best to solve that one first.

Everything is exactly the same here: the input, the task, the tests, and the expected output. The only difference is the code size limit: maximum **400 bytes**!

Oh, and there is no preloaded character map either... 

*Shortest solution to date: `284` bytes*

---

### My other katas

If you enjoyed this kata then please try [my other katas](https://www.codewars.com/users/anter69/authored)! :-)


#### *Translations are welcome!*
